solution_line_template: {total_attendees} x {first_team_percentage_from_solution} = <<{total_attendees}*{first_team_percentage_from_solution}={first_team_supporters}>>{first_team_supporters} people support the first team.
{total_attendees} x {second_team_percentage} = <<{total_attendees}*{second_team_percentage}={second_team_supporters}>>{second_team_supporters} people support the second team.

So, a total of {first_team_supporters} + {second_team_supporters} = <<{first_team_supporters}+{second_team_supporters}={total_supporters}>>{total_supporters} people supported the first and second teams.
Thus, {total_attendees} - {total_supporters} = <<{total_attendees}-{total_supporters}={non_supporters}>>{non_supporters} people did not support either team.
